scripts.db:migrate: pnpm db:pre-migrate && prisma migrate dev && pnpm db:post-migrate
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: pnpm db:pre-migrate && prisma migrate deploy && pnpm db:post-migrate
scripts.db:post-migrate: pnpm db:enable-realtime && pnpm db:enable-rls && pnpm db:create-buckets
scripts.db:reset: supabase db reset && npx prisma migrate deploy && pnpm db:post-migrate
scripts.db:disable-realtime: echo 'Disabling realtime publications...' && prisma db execute --file ./scripts/disable_realtime.sql --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:enable-realtime: echo 'Enabling realtime publications...' && prisma db execute --file ./scripts/enable_realtime.sql --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
